name: Shadow's Odyssey
description:
"Where...Where am I? I don't remember... Am I dreaming? Emily, where is Emily?"

Shadow's Odyssey is a short first-person atmospheric story experience which was created in 1 week by myself. It's a 3d exploration game set in a cold snowy mountainous area with a low poly texture. There is mystery, a strange place, snow and where is Emily?

Controls:

WASD = Movement

Mouse left click = Interact

Left Shift = Sprint

Spacebar = Jump

Esc = Pause Menu
